item.title: install npm package from npm pack-ed file using ansible
item.description: In case you want to install npm package file, created by “npm pack” command, just specify the path to the file to “name”. description: Install "sample" node.js package, created by "npm pack", located at /tmp/sample.tar.gz - npm: name=/tmp/sample.tar.gz path=/app/location That’s it.
